White_Plains.Edgemont Junior \u2013 Senior High Schoo: Edgemont Junior – Senior High School is a high school in Greenville, Westchester County, New York, serving students in grades 7 -12. Its feeder schools are Greenville School and Seely Place School, where students graduate in the sixth grade. The school's colors are blue and white, and its mascot is a panther.
